vision.notes: Likely relies on vision for identifying food and mates, given their bright coloration and presence in clear to muddy water.

chemoreception.notes: Uses chemoreception to locate food and assess water quality in their muddy or brackish water habitats.

mechanoreception.notes: Uses mechanoreception to detect water movement and pressure changes, important for navigating and detecting predators/prey in muddy environments. Lateral line system likely present.
